name: Asherman's Syndrome with Secondary Amenorrhea
chief_complaint: I haven't had my period for 6 months after my D&C procedure
prognosis: Good with proper treatment, though recurrence risk exists. Fertility may be restored in 70-80% of cases.
description: A condition characterized by intrauterine adhesions and scarring, often following uterine instrumentation (e.g., D&C). The adhesions can partially or completely obliterate the uterine cavity, leading to menstrual disturbances and infertility.
